title: Looking to buy a few T205's
author: campyfan39

posts.post_title: Looking to buy a few T205's
posts.post_content:
Hey everyone.
I am brand new to pre-war collecting. Some T205's I really like are:
Bergen
Tinker
Baker
Evers
Wheat
Chance
Matthewson

Anyone have some of these for sale or any others that would be good for a new collector, not looking for the set but just for a few stars? THANK YOU!
Looking for cards in the range of PSA 2-4, don't care if they are graded or raw.
